content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5)
- Boiler (position -11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe groups connecting these entities:
  - Pipe group (position -13.5, 20.5) - Status: EMPTY
  - Pipe group (position -9.5, 21.5) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT
  - Pipe group (position -11.5, 23.5) - Status: EMPTY
- Electricity group (position -11.7, 24.3) - Status: WORKING

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, 5.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when reconnecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that the pipes are placed correctly and there are no obstructions between the boiler and steam engine. Check the positions to ensure they are aligned.

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Verify that the connection points for the offshore pump and boiler are accessible and correctly positioned. Ensure there are no other entities blocking the connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
